body: That little amount , (60 mil) burned consistently,  say twice a month for 10 years is a trillion.  So at least they're making an effort to do something .   If they're able to get more people commited it can make a difference. I bought a bunch of different meme coins specifically as a gamble that one day , at least one of them will pay off.   I'm ok with waiting 10 years.

author: trobits
body: You are right that we want the Ad revenue. However, you did not mention that we use the Ad revenue to burn SHIB and LUNC. Check out the burn archive ([Trobits](https://trobits.com/archive/shiba)) and verify the burns for yourself!

author: trobits
body: Visit [www.trobits.com](http://www.trobits.com) You can read news articles, signup, watch expert videos or simply engage with the community. Games and more content coming shortly. Each visit helps raise money through ads. You don't need to buy anything. Trobits gets paid simply based on traffic. You can also spread the word and help us get more traffic. The more often you visit, the more the site generates from ads. The ad revenue is used to buy and burn the coins.   You don't have to burn your own coins. Please keep them and sell for a profit. I don't burn my own coins. I'm waiting to sell once we get to $1. It will take some time. But it's very possible.

author: itdoesntmatta69
body: That number is just for the OP burn effort if it never grows and no more people join the movement.  There are other burn efforts currently and  there will be in the future. You're one of the people that expect one day 20 quadrillion tokens will be burned in a single burn. It doesn't work that way. It also isn't going to make you rich any time soon. That doesn't mean it never will. But you'll have sold at a lose long before then and will be in to the next one that you'll be under water in

author: trobits
body: We don't want you to burn your coins. KEEP YOUR COINS! Sell them for a profit.  What we need is traffic to [www.trobits.com](http://www.trobits.com) We use Ad revenue to buy the coins and burn. Don't burn your coins

author: trobits
body: We use everything to burn the coins. We actually have to supplement it daily. Not including the cost of articles and marketing. We hope that soon, once we have enough traffic, the site will be able to take care of itself and we won't have to put in any more money. The beginning is always tough and someone has to pay the price!  We are doing this because we believe that SHIB and LUNC can get to $1 each. If that happens, we will be multimillionaires.  Likewise, many in the forum.   Remember, we need about 1000 views to make roughly $1. With enough traffic, we could be making thousands of dollars and burning billions of coins everyday!
